TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSetter extends System.Windows.SetterBase

summary.span: 以某种样式表示事件资源库。

span.span: Represents an event setter in a style.

summary.span: 事件资源库可调用指定的事件处理程序来响应事件。

span.span: Event setters invoke the specified event handlers in response to events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件资源库可调用指定的事件处理程序以响应路由事件，这些事件应用于引用的所有元素， 而不是要求您将实例处理程序附加到每个单独的元素。Event setters invoke the specified event handlers in response to routed events, which apply to all elements that reference the rather than requiring you to attach instance handlers to each individual element. 仅 支持 对象。Only support objects. 只能为作为路由事件的事件声明事件资源库。You can only declare event setters for events that are routed events. 可以使用直接路由策略、冒泡事件或隧道事件为路由事件声明事件资源库。You can declare event setters for routed events with a direct routing strategy, bubbling events, or tunneling events. 通常通过创建类的实例 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，作为通过定义的样式中的对象元素 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Instances of the class are usually created through [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an object element within a style defined through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 还可以从代码中实例化。An might also be instantiated from code. 事件资源库不能用于主题资源字典中包含的样式。Event setters cannot be used in a style that is contained in a theme resource dictionary. 这是因为主题资源字典在运行时通常是松散 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] 文件，并且没有定义定义处理程序的随附代码隐藏的任何范围。This is because a theme resource dictionary at run time is often loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] files, and does not have any scope defined where accompanying code-behind that defines the handlers can exist. 在事件的任何类处理程序之后以及任何实例处理程序之后，都将调用通过事件资源库附加的处理程序。Handlers attached through event setters are invoked after any class handlers for an event, and also after any instance handlers. 因此，如果类处理程序或实例处理程序将事件标记为在其参数中处理，则不会调用由事件资源库声明的处理程序，除非具体设置事件资源库 `true` 。As a result, if a class handler or instance handler marks an event handled in its arguments, then the handler declared by an event setter is not invoked, unless the event setter specifically sets `true`. 事件资源库还可以来自 样式。Event setters may also come from styles. 指定为的样式中的事件资源库处理程序 将在处理程序立即被调用。The event setter handlers from the style specified as will be invoked after the handlers on the immediate style. 请注意，仅 支持 对象。Note that only supports objects. ) 不 支持 (和派生类的触发器 。Triggers ( and derived classes) do not support . ## Examples 下面的示例在 页级样式中建立了一个。The following example establishes a single within a page-level style. [!code-xaml[EventOvwSupport#XAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml#xaml2)] 下面显示了示例事件处理程序：The following shows the example event handlers: [!code-csharp[EventOvwSupport#EventSetterRef](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml.cs#eventsetterref)] [!code-vb[EventOvwSupport#EventSetterRef](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/visualbasic/page2.xaml.vb#eventsetterref)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你 在代码中创建或在代码隐藏中创建，以便在 使用之前增强现有样式，通常会使用此签名。This signature is typically used if you creating an in code, or in code-behind to create an that augments an existing style prior to use.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 响应的特定路由事件。

span.span: Gets or sets the particular routed event that this responds to.

value.span: 路由事件的标识符字段。

span.span: The identifier field of the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦使用了包含的样式，就不能设置此属性 ，因此它是密封的。You cannot set this property once the style containing the is in use and thus is sealed. 如果您在代码中设置此属性，并且可能使用了样式，则在 您尝试设置之前，检查实例上的属性的值 。If you set this property in code and there is the possibility that the style is in use, check the value of the property on the instance before you attempt to set . ## Examples 下面的示例将 属性设置为 标记样式中的的一部分。The following example sets the property as part of an in a markup style. [!code-xaml[EventOvwSupport#XAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml#xaml2)]

exception.span: 尝试对密封 设置此属性。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否仍然应调用分配给资源库的处理程序，即使事件在其事件数据中被标记为已处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the handler assigned to the setter should still be invoked, even if the event is marked handled in its event data.

value.span: 如果仍然应调用处理程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handler should still be invoked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要设置 事件处理程序的调用方式，必须始终在代码中执行此操作，与一般原则相同，即在将 实例的定义的事件处理程序直接分配给属性语法中的命名事件时无法指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Setting the characteristics of how an event's handlers will be invoked must always be performed in code, in keeping with the general principle that there is no way to specify when assigning defined event handlers for instances directly to named events in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute syntax. 尽管在中设置此值不 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 会生成任何编译时错误，但如果使用样式，则生成的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 将生成运行时异常。Although setting this value in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] does not generate any compile-time errors, the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will produce a run-time exception when the style is used. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不应在中使用此属性 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。This property should not be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.
